Uses of Class
io.discloader.discloader.entity.RichEmbed

  • Packages that use RichEmbed 
    Package Description
    io.discloader.discloader.entity
    Contains the objects used in Discord's API, Like Users, and Guilds
    io.discloader.discloader.entity.channels
    Contains classes that represent channels on discord
    io.discloader.discloader.entity.impl  
    io.discloader.discloader.entity.message
    Contains all classes relating to Messages
    io.discloader.discloader.entity.sendable
    Contains prototypes meant to be serialized and sent to Discord's servers via REST or gateway
    io.discloader.discloader.network.rest
